rows.label: campfev11_170_150_msg0001
rows.name:
I wonder what kind of place
Trigo is...

rows.label: campfev11_170_150_msg0002
rows.name:
You'll be reunited with your mother
soon, Laura-sama

rows.label: campfev11_170_150_msg0004
rows.name: Gula is a real sight to behold.

rows.label: campfev11_170_150_msg0005
rows.name:
But that beauty can harbor many perils.
It's home to plenty of monsters.

rows.label: campfev11_170_150_msg0006
rows.name: You should keep your wits about, Kasumi.

rows.label: campfev11_170_150_msg0007
rows.name:
I know. Protecting Laura-sama
is my duty. I never forget that,
not for a moment

rows.label: campfev11_170_150_msg0009
rows.name:
Teehee... I'm sure the two of you will
be able to keep me safe, somehow...
